description: Visual Studio project templates for creating custom SharePoint service applications. This version supports Visual Studio 2012 and SharePoint 2010/2013 only. For Visual Studio 2010 and SharePoint 2010 support, please install the Visual Studio 2010 version of this extension.
summary: A Visual Studio Extension that installs SharePoint project templates for creating custom SharePoint Service Applications of different flavors.
author: Adam Toth
